segments.text: I like the Honda Accord you showed me before . I think it's more practical for my needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , sir . You are making a good choice.Honda has made a lot of design improvements in the new Accord .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does it come with standard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On all our new cars , the standards includeair conditioning , anti-lock brakes , air bags , and an AM / FM stereo with a CD player.But on the Accord , there is another standard item as well.The Accord com
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cruise control ? I don't like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's dangerous . What if I can't turn it off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir , I know some of our customers are concerned about cruise control.But Honda has never had a single cruise control malfunction that led to an accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish it didn't have cruise control . My wife doesn't like it either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , sir , you don't have to use it.You can turn it on or off . If you don't want to use it , you just never turn it on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose . And what about the sunroof ? Is that standard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , the sunroof is optional , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Another important question is the time I can get this car . I need a new car rather soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can say that the new models will be here in August.If you order one now , we will have it for you in August .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good enough , I think . What colors does the new Accord come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have this new model in red , white , black , or silver.These are the standard colors.Of course you could specially order from various other colors too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My brother has last year's Accord.And his car is a kind of soft purple color mixed with silver . I really like that color . I wonder if I can get that color on my Accord .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know the color you mean . Is this it , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think that's it . Can I get that on the Accord ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can.That color is very popular with Honda buyers . So we've kept it available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think I want to order the new Accord then.It looks like an excellent car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have made a good choice , sir . I drive an Accord myself . They are very solidly built machines , very reliable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know . I think Honda is the most reliable car on the road . I would never change to anything else.The Honda I have now almost never has service problems . It runs smooth as silk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , sir . I will get the paperwork ready for you . Just a moment .
segments.speaker: S2
